mapper.select: select T.ID, T.PROJECT_ID, T.USER_ID, T.COURSE_ID, T.TRAIN_ID, T.TEACHER_ID, T.INSEPARABLE, T.ACCURACY, T.LIVELY, T.DEEP_GOING, T.CLEAR, T.INSIDE_DOPESTER, T.PROPERLY, T.BODY_LANGUAGE, T.APPROPRIATE, T.ACTIVE, T.CREATOR, T.CREATE_TIME, T.UPDATEDBY, T.UPDATE_TIME, T.IS_DELETED, T.VERSION (T.INSEPARABLE+T.ACCURACY+T.LIVELY+T.DEEP_GOING+T.CLEAR+T.INSIDE_DOPESTER+T.PROPERLY+T.BODY_LANGUAGE+T.APPROPRIATE+T.ACTIVE) TOTAL_NUM , from IPR_TEACHING_EVALUA T where T.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
